text: Mr. Anthony Fell (Yarmouth) called the decision "shocking" and added: "It is the most disastrous thing any Prime Minister can do. The best service the Prime Minister can do would be to resign." The outburst shocked MPs of all parties. Even close friends were signalling Mr. Fell to stop.
handwritten_text: Mr. Anthony Fell (Yarmouth) called the decision "shocking" and added: "It is the most disastrous thing any Prime Minister can do. The best service the Prime Minister can do would be to resign." The outburst shocked MPs of all parties. Even close friends were signalling Mr. Fell to stop.
